Name: Face Your Demons
About the game: A short jumpscare experience, based on a demon encounter in a haunted cathedral. - Total duration: about two minutes of linear experience; - Gaze-based menu, no need for controllers; - Great for first-time VR users - especially family and friends - and for those who enjoy a dark mood and ambiance.
Meta Title: Face Your Demons: Aug 10, 2019, ARTIV and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Face Your Demons? Check out the release date (Aug 10, 2019), developer insights from ARTIV, and a complete game summary.
